abstract: Although on Wednesday morning it looked as if they might have to break out the orange soccer balls at Dick's Sporting Goods Park, there will be playoff soccer in Colorado on Thursday night.
snippet: Although on Wednesday morning it looked as if they might have to break out the orange soccer balls at Dick's Sporting Goods Park, there will be playoff soccer in Colorado on Thursday night.
